note_models.name: Merriam-Webster-Word

tmpls.afmt:
<script>
function showhomophone(sender) {
  var homophones = document.getElementsByClassName("word_homophone_container");
  // Hide all homophones
  var i_;
  for (i_ = 0; i_ < homophones.length; i_++) {
    homophones[i_].getElementsByClassName("word_not_header")[0].style.display =
      "none";
  }
  // Show itself
  sender.getElementsByClassName("word_not_header")[0].style.display = "block";
}

function showextra() {
  // Loop over all long definition containers
  var elements = document.getElementsByClassName(
    "word_long_definition_list_container"
  );
  var i = 0;
  for (i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
    elements[i].style.display = "block";
  }
  
  // Loop over all show buttons
  var elements = document.getElementsByClassName(
    "word_long_definition_show_button"
  );
  var i = 0;
  for (i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
    elements[i].style.display = "none";
  }
  
  // Loop over all hide buttons
  var elements = document.getElementsByClassName(
    "word_long_definition_hide_button"
  );
  var i = 0;
  for (i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
    elements[i].style.display = "block";
  }
}

function hideextra() {
  // Loop over all long definition containers
  var elements = document.getElementsByClassName(
    "word_long_definition_list_container"
  );
  var i = 0;
  for (i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
    elements[i].style.display = "none";
  }
  
  // Loop over all show buttons
  var elements = document.getElementsByClassName(
    "word_long_definition_show_button"
  );
  var i = 0;
  for (i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
    elements[i].style.display = "block";
  }
  
  // Loop over all hide buttons
  var elements = document.getElementsByClassName(
    "word_long_definition_hide_button"
  );
  var i = 0;
  for (i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
    elements[i].style.display = "none";
  }
}
</script>

{{Back}}

<script>

  var current_text = document.getElementsByClassName("word_word")[0].innerHTML;
  var new_text = current_text.split("*").join("");
  document.getElementsByClassName("word_word")[0].innerHTML = new_text;

  // Loop over all homophones
  // First get all homophones
  var homophones = document.getElementsByClassName("word_homophone_container");
  // Loop over all except for the first one and set display to none
  var i;
  for (i = 1; i < homophones.length; i++) {
    homophones[i].getElementsByClassName("word_not_header")[0].style.display =
      "none";
  }
</script>
